name: Homegear::download
shortDescription: Downloads a file from a web server.
description: This method downloads a file from a web server. It was implemented to add the possibility to download files SSL encrypted on embedded systems when OpenSSL certificate verification is not working. Don't use it to download large files, as the download is fully saved to memory before writing it to the disk.
signatures: string getHttpContents(string $hostname, int $port, string $path, string $filename, string $caFile, bool $verifyCertificate)

parameters.name: hostname
parameters.description: The hostname of the web server to get the source from.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port number the web server listens on.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the file to return.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The filename to save the file to.

parameters.name: caFile
parameters.description: The path to the certificate file to verify the web server certificate against.

parameters.name: verifyCertificate
parameters.description: Enable certificate verification. Only disable this for testing purposes.

returnValue: Returns "true" on success and "false" on errors.
